ul.li: Many environments change at increasing velocities

Internal: Being able to plan and execute changing quickly improves fitness

slide.title: Mixed Content
slide.p: The term Mixed content in XML refers to elements which have text content mixed with elements. What these elements do depends on the elements , but the important point is that they are on the same level as the text nodes of the mixed content.
